ygData.subject: Re: starting smithing
ygData.msgSnippet: i made lanterns until trivial. Then skewers until trivial. That took me to level 115 i believe. sewing kits until 135..after that its just making the armor
ygData.messageBody:
i made lanterns until trivial. Then skewers until trivial. That took me to
level 115 i believe. sewing kits until 135..after that its just making the
armor that raises your skill. Bracers and gorgets are easy to make at like
around 80 or 90..at least for me they were. All other items are pretty
sucessfull too around 115..except leggins and mail. Their the hardest. Ive
given up on smithing...i put so much money into with nothing to show for it.
Everyone sells stuff for so cheap... just not worth while. good luck
